function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper ventilation and airflow in apartment units","Impact":"Increased risk of virus accumulation and propagation","Mitigation":"Ensure proper ventilation systems and airflow control measures are in place","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems, air purifiers, and HVAC systems with HEPA filters","People":"Residents, building occupants, and visitors","Owner":"Architects, building designers, and property developers"},{"Description":"Inadequate access to daylight and natural light","Impact":"Higher humidity levels and increased risk of virus accumulation","Mitigation":"Design spaces with sufficient windows and openings to allow for natural light and shadow reflection","Technologies":"Smart windows, reflective coatings, and daylight sensors","People":"Residents, building occupants, and visitors","Owner":"Architects, building designers, and property developers"},{"Description":"Lack of application of biophilic design principles","Impact":"Decreased well-being and resilience to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Incorporate biophilic design patterns and criteria into the design of apartment units to promote physical and psychological health","Technologies":"Biophilic design elements, nature-inspired materials, and green spaces","People":"Residents, building occupants, and visitors","Owner":"Architects, building designers, and property developers"}]}
